item.description:
The Lowell Folk Festival begins on Friday evening, July 23th 6:40pm with a kick-off parade and music and ethnic foods at the Boarding House Park and Dutton Street Dance Pavilion

Let's meet at 6:30PM on the corner of John St and French St
http://www.lowellfolk...
and enjoy the food and music at the Boarding House Park:
6:40pm Parade - Worcester Kiltie Pipe Band
7:15pm De Temps Antan (Quebecois)
8:15pm Steep Canyon Rangers (Bluegrass)
9:15pm Clinton Fearon & The Boogie Brown Band (Jamaican reggae)

during the evening we can wander over to the Dutton Street and join "Marie 5JV" at the dance pavilion.
7:15pm The Bruce Daigrepont Cajun Band (Cajun)
8:15pm Plena Libre (salsa/bomba y plena)

* Bring lawn chair or blanket for the Boarding House Park lawn seating

All performances and activities within the Festival are FREE.

Food, beverage, and merchandise sales are available throughout the Festival.

Parking in all Garages is $15 all day/night during the festival.
* portion of the money will go to the festival
But note - Cash or Checks accepted, NO credit cards.
item.how_to_find_us: at corner of John St & French St OR by phone (# provided to all YES replies)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Lowell Folk Festival
